description: Brand new coderef-dashboard project with correct monorepo architecture and coming-soon widget placeholder. Single-page focus: setup infrastructure, validate with 1 simple widget.
goal: Build production-ready architecture with npm workspaces monorepo, unified codebase for PWA + Electron, widget loader/registry system, and coming-soon placeholder widget. Zero existing code - fresh start with clean structure.
requirements: Monorepo structure with npm workspaces (core, widgets, dashboard, electron-app)
Unified Next.js codebase serving both PWA and Electron
Coming-soon widget as proof of concept
Testable in both PWA and Electron environments
out_of_scope: File manager, terminal, system monitor widgets
API endpoints beyond basic health checks
constraints: Fresh codebase - no legacy code to migrate
Unified single build for PWA and Electron
Python backend must be bundled, not required for PWA
Widget interface must be strict contract
No existing code to preserve or maintain compatibility with
